channel.title: Server Lag Problems
channel.description:
Hello I Am Sacuv
me and my Friend heartless Have been making a server together heartlesspkscape.no-ip.org and it lags Frequently, We do not Know How To End This Superior Lag If there is Any hints or tips it what be Appreiciated..
Thanks, Sacuv¬

item.title: Server Lag Problems
item.dc:creator: @Rolling_On_Java Rolling On Java
item.description:
@Rolling_On_Java wrote:

try restarting your server every now and then, try getting a new and faster modem/Broadband or just try to stop the person that joins and lags it, also running many programs will cause lagg

Get rid of the lagggggggggggggggggggggggggggg NOW!

Read full topic
